Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems

MetricDescription: % systems with documented risk assessment reports
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better, ideally 100%. Good idea to insist on this for at least the critical systems
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems
